project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Borgou Region Pilot Rural Support Project is to improve the capacity of rural women and village communities to better manage their socio-economic environment through: (a) improving the understanding of this environment; (b) improving local institutes to strengthen collective decision-making capabilities; (c) providing the populations with resources to implement their development plans; and (d) improving the capacity of the providers of goods and services to respond to demands from the rural communities to carry out sustainable development activities designed and implemented through a participatory approach. The project components include: (a) capacity building in rural villages of the Borgou; (b) community-based local development; and (c) participatory management, technical support and monitoring.
